attributes.action: Stop giving british tax payers money to foriegn countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every time there is a disaster abroad the government gives away millions of pounds of the tax payers money in aid. The tax payer is never asked if this is how they want their money spent. When we have disasters on UK soil (like the recent floods) there would be many more funds in place to help UK residents.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
